name: Land Tycoon
description:
The sea levels are rising.

Luckily you're a land tycoon!

Invest in raising and developing your land to earn as much money as you can.

~ How to Play ~

  • Each block of habitable (above the sea) land earns you money
  • The safer land is (higher, more developed) the more it earns you
  • Raise and develop land to earn more money!
  • It costs more to raise developed land (have you tried lifting a city?!)
  • You can reclaim land from the sea by raising it, but it costs more to raise land that's already sunk.

~ Controls ~

  • Left Click: Raise land
  • Right Click: Develop land (farm > town > city > farm)
